content: this mandala has been designed as a table mat but you can make it as a doily plant pot mat place mat etc too ideal to use up all those bright colored odd scraps of yarn to make a pretty piece of home decor it s an easy fun little project that you can crochet up fairly quickly the patterns instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** level intermediate copyright ©2019 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/mandala/
